name: Latt' e Liett'

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We really liked the apartment and Giancarlo, the owner, was excellent. He is a traveler, too, and knows what matters to travelers. He had lots of information about Naples, including his favourite restaurants. He was very friendly and even left some delicious cake for us. The apartment was very clean and comfortable. The location is very convenient, just a bus ride away from the central train station or the Circumvesuviana train station, and across from the port which is very convenient if you're looking to take the ferry to Capri. It was a short walk to Spaccanapoli and Galleria Umberto, plus lots of good restaurants nearby.
reviews.title: Very nice apartment; good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only thing to improve, which I suggested to Giancarlo, was to provide healthier breakfast alternatives like muesli or oat meal. The breakfast is self-serve but it was mainly processed/not healthy stuff. A previous review had mentioned this already so I made sure to pack a bag of muesli with us. But I couldn't resist having Giancarlo's chocolate cake for breakfast one morning!
reviews.title: highly recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A well thought of Bed and Breakfast with self-catering and well decorated appartments. The owner has thought about everything : a huge number of flyers and brochures of Naples and surroundings, a list of his favourite restaurants, shops, monuments and shops. He spent a lot of time explaining everything we could need, and twice during our stay he dropped by with cake and chocolates. He made us feel so at home that it almost felt as if we were visiting a friend.
reviews.title: Excellent accommodation & fantastic service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In addition to that, the B&B is perfectly situated, accross the street from the port where you can catch ferries to Capri, the Amalfi coast and many more destinations. Also accross the street is the bus station to Pompeya.
reviews.title: a wonderful B& B with its central position and comfortable atmosphere.

reviews.text: And it is also ideally situated to visit Naples (5 min walk to the Castel Nuovo, 15 to the old town and 20 from the museum) and there are buses to everywhere right in front of the hotel.
reviews.title: Loved it!

likes.liked: — The hospitality of the owner, the location and the AC!
likes.disliked: — The sofa bed and the breakfast

reviews.text: I booked this B&B because of its location close to the airport bus stop in Piazza Municipio. The location worked well for that, and the owner recommended some nearby restaurants. However, the B&B is on the second floor looking across a very busy road to the ferry port, and the traffic noise is considerable. The terrace is basically useless because of the noise, and the "sea view" mostly consists of large cruise ships. In one way it's good that the B&B is only on the second floor, because often the elevator would refuse to work unless fed money!!!
reviews.title: Good location, not so good stay

reviews.text: The owner had arranged a meeting time with me, but arrived a good 15 minutes after the time he stated. I would suggest that if you stay here you arrange to meet him in one of the cafes nearby, as there is nowhere to sit in the interior courtyard and at night you'd be stuck in the grimy street outside.
reviews.title: I strongly recommnend this b&b

likes.liked: — Great seaview. very clean and nice room. kitchenette in my room. location very convenient. friendly and helpful owner.restaurants nearby

reviews.text: Breakfast turned out to be a few aging carbs, OJ and Nescafe. I found the sofa bed a problem as the metal underpinnings weren't covered, and despite using care getting in and out I wound up with red marks on my legs. Electricity only worked if a gizmo attached to the keyring was inserted into a receptacle, which made locking the door at night difficult.
reviews.title: Clean, well-located, great owners

description: The Latt' e Liett' B&B is a window on the gulf in the center of Naples just 20 meters from Maschio Angioino Castle (Castel Nuovo) and from Piazza del Plebiscito, also just a few steps from historical part where you will find the most important monuments. Right in front us there is the Port with ferries to: Capri, Ischia, Procida, Sorrento. Only 2 minutes by walk to the "SITA" Bus station to: Vesuvio, Pompei, Ercolano, Sorrento, Positano and Amalfi
